channel.title: Beau Kinstler Info
channel.description: Beau Kinstler's Blog: I think I'm the only Beau Kinstler that's ever lived so you're probably in the right place if you're looking for info like: Who is Beau Kinstler? What's he about?

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description:
This is just a quick post to get the ball rolling, and make sure all the bits are in order. Would not want to get caught with my oughts swapped.

Check out the twitter feed for mostly random things, but I think it trends a bit infosec. I guess that’s the click-bait I fall for the most. You can also find me on Github. For a bit more background, you could try the the About page, which I’m sure you could have guessed.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out on email!
